relationships.description: Professor McGonagall is hosting the Yule Ball event.
Lavender finds Professor McGonagall's comment funny.
Harry sees Professor McGonagall looking as though she has never let her hair down.
Professor McGonagall is displeased with the idea of a Gryffindor student embarrassing the school.
